input.sentences: enjoying the day in our lovely hills .
here we came across this old roller coaster what a lovely way to relax .
on a casual stroll through the mountain is so relaxing .
time to eat lunch and watch the clouds roll by .
output.sentences: A family decided to go enjoy the lovely hills this morning.
There was a playground for the children to relax and enjoy.
The parents got to stroll around and just enjoy themselves.
The kids were having fun and the adults finally got to just watch the time roll by.
At the end of the day everyone was exhausted.
